games.name: League of Legends
games.description: Join the battle in the world's most popular MOBA. Choose from over 160 champions and compete in strategic 5v5 matches on Summoner's Rift.

games.name: Valorant
games.description: A 5v5 character-based tactical FPS where precise gunplay meets unique agent abilities. Outsmart and outshoot your opponents in this competitive shooter.

games.name: Teamfight Tactics
games.description: An auto-battler strategy game where you draft, position, and watch your team fight. Build the perfect comp and climb the ranks in this chess-like experience.

games.name: League of Legends: Wild Rift
games.description: Experience the thrill of League of Legends on mobile and console. Fast-paced 5v5 MOBA action designed for shorter matches without sacrificing depth.
